participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and introspective, Emma enjoys exploring nature and reflecting on her experiences.
participant_1.background: i've a pet fish. my favorite color is orange. i like to go hiking in the mornings to see the sunset. i turned 18 years old yesterday. i just broke up with boyfriend two months ago.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and practical, Liam values simplicity and enjoys engaging in various hobbies.
participant_2.background: i do not care about fashion. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i dance on the weekends. i compete in dog agility classes.
